permafrost.tundra.server.content

Class ContentHandlerOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.content.ContentHandlerOutput

  • public class ContentHandlerOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps the arguments to the ContentHandler putOutputValues method, so that they can be mutated.
